articles.title: Australia reports deadliest day of coronavirus pandemic as cases escalate - Global News
articles.description: Victoria reported 21 deaths - two more than the previous deadliest days earlier this week - and 410 new cases in the past 24 hours, ending a run of three consecutive days with new infections below 400.
